head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths POLLAN, ANTONIO E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths POLLAN, ANTONIO E.

block.p: POLLAN-Antonio E. Of Rego Park, NY and Madrid, Spain on July 6, 2000. Beloved husband of Rosita. Devoted father or Rosemarie, Antonio and Fernando. Dear brother of Carmen, Rosi and Luisi all in Spain. Loving grandfather of Tony, Frank, Veronica, Kristin and Christopher. Father-inlaw of Frank and Theresa. Loved also by Marie Filippelli and Emily Angello. Reposing Glascott Funeral Home, 102-03 Metropolitan Ave., Forest Hills. Mass Our Lady of Mercy Church, Monday 9:45AM.
